dumbo.name: Dumbo
dumbo.description: It's Dumbo. He's dumb. Very dumb. Dumbo.
dumbo.victory: Dumbo has finally been taught that he is in fact, incredibly dumb!
dumbo.loss: Your raid group was no match for Dumbo's absolutely insane intellect!

ninja_grumbo.name: Ninja Grumbo
ninja_grumbo.description: Ninja Grumbo is a master in sneaky tactics, speedy attacks and of course, being a Samurai. Or a Ninja.
ninja_grumbo.victory: It seems Ninja Grumbo isn't the best Ninja around!
ninja_grumbo.loss: Sneaky, sneaky... and you're all dead now.

grumboracle.name: Grumboracle
grumboracle.description: The all knowing Oracle of the Grumbos. Not quite as smart as the Dumbo, but it's close.
grumboracle.victory: The Grumboracle was not all knowing enough for your raid group!
grumboracle.loss: Everyone was erased from history by the Grumboracle...
